name: add-to-calendar-buttons
description: Easily add a "add to calendar" button to your websites. This JavaScript library supports Google Calendar, iCal, Outlook and Yahoo Calendar.

scripts.coverage: gulp && istanbul cover _mocha --report html -- --require test/support/coverage && open coverage/index.html
scripts.coveralls: gulp && istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- --require test/support/coverage && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Carl Sednaoui
